programme.title: No Late Nights
programme.desc: A newly-wed couple, James & Bella face challenges when Bella’s paranoia about night-time threatens their relationship.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S7 - Uduak Obong Patrick
programme.desc: Join AMC as we speak to some of Nollywood's movers and shakers, including actors, directors, producers etc, and get some behind-the-scenes insight on their work.

programme.title: Ogidigba
programme.desc: A recently engaged lady re-thinks her decision when she finds out about a strange but powerful deity in her fiancé’s family.

programme.title: Maid In A Mansion
programme.desc: A woman is accused of her husband’s death due to their tumultuous relationship, but all is not as it seems within the household.

programme.title: All Shades Of Amanda
programme.desc: Love finds a young girl who dwells in the captivity of her past heartbreak but she tries to fight it.

programme.title: Motives
programme.desc: After abandoning her baby at a hospital with a hole in his heart, the estranged mother comes back for him when he's been adopted by an ICU nurse. A child tussle emanates when the love of motherhood comes as a realisation between the two women, the biological mum and a caretaker mum.

programme.title: Loving A Con Man
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Zed, who goes by many names, is a perfect con man, making women fall for him and taking their money. Things start to change when he meets Tabitha, a successful novelist with a fiancé abroad. Zed believes she is the perfect victim for a con until he starts to fall for her.

programme.title: Indecent Affair
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a woman's controlling husband convinces her to pose as his cousin at a work event so his philandering boss can seduce her, the consequences are not only dire, but they also impose on everyone a journey of self discovery.

programme.title: A Dance With Mama
programme.desc: The past and present collide when young man is about to become a father for the first time and sees that some of the challenges his wife goes through appear to mirror what his mother suffered through

programme.title: Deception
programme.desc: Sindia, who constantly thwarts her parents matchmaking efforts, finally meets a man she wants to marry, Demola, but has to fight to win her father's approval.

programme.title: Ralia's Secret
programme.desc: Ralia, feeling conflicted and burdened by a secret plan she harbours, must protect her secret at all cost when a familiar face from her past finds her and threatens to unravel her plans.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S7 - Moses Babatope
programme.desc: Brand new season with A list Nollywood celebrities! Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and sh

programme.title: Shades Of Lies
programme.desc: Teni's ambitions get the best of her when she follows bad advices at work after her boss, chief maxwell, is involved in an accident. When chief maxwell's family suspect foul play, the police get involved and it becomes increasingly clear that there is more to chief maxwell's death than meets the eye.

programme.title: Burning Desire
programme.desc: After getting drunk during a club party with friends, kay gets entangled in a one-night stand with an older married woman, mariah, who becomes obsessed with him. Things go awry when kay comes back home from work one evening and finds mariah sitting in his living room with his wife, angela, claiming to be his aunt who just returned from overseas.

programme.title: Femi
programme.desc: Geneticist Femi Fernandez seeks the perfect male gene, inspired by the works of an enchanting painting, that makes her unexpectedly drawn to the artist to devastating consequences.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S7 - Iyimide Olumoko
programme.desc: Brand new season with A list Nollywood celebrities! Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits it's all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Daybreak
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A typical heartbreaker and playboy wakes up to find out that his manhood has disappeared. He consults a prophet and finds out the curse has been put on him by one of the women he has angered and he has 24 hours to seek forgiveness from the one who has cursed him. The problem is, he doesn't know who the culprit is amongst all the women he has angered.
